dao.name: SEL_ATTEN_NAM
dao.statement: select cust_mn_pers_dt.per_nam as atten_nam, role_rf.role_rmk, cust_mn_pers_dt.tel_nos from cust_mn_pers_dt,role_rf where cust_mn_pers_dt.role_cod = role_rf.role_cod(+)

dao.name: QRY_ATTEN_NAM
dao.statement: select cust_mn_pers_dt.per_nam as atten_nam from cust_mn_pers_dt,role_rf,member_mn where cust_mn_pers_dt.role_cod=role_rf.role_cod(+) and cust_mn_pers_dt.secretary_cod=member_mn.cust_cod(+) and trim(cust_mn_pers_dt.cust_cod) = trim(:cust_cod) and trim(cust_mn_pers_dt.seq_nos) = trim(:atten_cod)

dao.name: QRY_CUST_MN_PERS_DT
dao.statement: select 'n' primary_pers, cust_idx.alt_nam, cust_mn_pers_dt.dept_nam, cust_mn_pers_dt.role_cod, cust_mn_pers_dt.job_sta, cust_idx.mobile_nos, cust_idx.office_tel, cust_idx.home_tel, cust_idx.fax_nos, cust_idx.e_mail, cust_mn_pers_dt.remark, cust_mn_pers_dt.quit_dat,cust_mn_pers_dt.athena_id, cust_idx.sex_typ, cust_idx.birth_dat, cust_mn_pers_dt.seq_nos, cust_mn_pers_dt.per_cust_cod, cust_mn_pers_dt.cust_cod from cust_mn_pers_dt left join cust_idx on cust_mn_pers_dt.athena_id = cust_idx.athena_id where cust_mn_pers_dt.per_cust_cod = cust_idx.cust_cod and cust_idx.from_table = 'CUST_MN_PERS_DT' and cust_mn_pers_dt.athena_id = :athena_id and cust_mn_pers_dt.cust_cod = :cust_cod

dao.name: CHK_RELATED_PERSON_IS_USED
dao.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) AS related_person_count FROM CUST_MN_PERS_DT WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND PER_CUST_COD = :per_cust_cod AND CUST_COD <> :cust_cod AND ROWNUM <= 1
